topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ecc96263687230cc596100#post_54ecc96263687230cc596100
Brooklyn style pizza is thin, foldable, and has huge slices of pepperoni.
Chicago style pizza isn't as big, but it's deep and saucey and pretty much requires a fork to eat.
